ygData.subject: Re: GENERAL TIP
ygData.msgSnippet: The tracking skill works well in this kind of situation as well.  One trick with tracking is that you don t actually have to select something to track.  Simply
ygData.messageBody:
The tracking skill works well in this kind of situation as well. One trick with
tracking is that you don't actually have to select something to track. Simply
click track, then cancel, then track, then cancel...

"Cillo, Christopher L." wrote:

> Another tip with working on skills, if you need to take a break from hacking
> and slashing and you want to relax and make a little money try fishing.
> While you are fishing you can MED. So practice spells till out of mana, MED
> and you can still fish, and work on Sense heading.
